p.a: Event: District Board of Directors Meeting
Event: District Board of Directors Meeting

div.p:
We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, how 'bout you?
Wednesday Dress Up Day (4/29): Decade Day - Pick a decade (50’s, 60’s, 70’s, 80’s) and have a great time remembering the fashion of that era.
Weekly Challenge: Blindfolded Artist - Put on a blindfold and try your best to draw a picture of an eagle. Send in a photo with your drawing to show us your artistic abilities, or lack thereof.
Student Spotlight: Share your hobbies, hidden talents, or let us know what you're doing for fun during this time of social distancing!
If you want your school spirit photos shared to the school’s livestream and facebook page, email them to Ms. Christensen at corey.christensen@mckenziesd.org
Go Eagles!

Good Morning McKenzie Families, today is a meal delivery day. We will be around with meals on our 2-hour delayed morning route. If you need meals or to update your form, go here: https://forms.gle/5XE4DdiJLn3Zdi8x6 Next meal delivery day is Thursday.

Tia and Mrs. Vreeland are showing their school spirit dressed as Alice from Alice in Wonderland and Pete the Cat.
GO EAGLES! view image

Today, tomorrow, next month, next year. #WeWillPlayAgain Get the app OSAA.org/app. Best pics tomorrow win OSAA Nike gear! https://drive.google.com/a/mckenziesd.com/file/d/1bUcQ8CK4a2xG6TOP0F2tNuMg2_za9LCN/view?usp=drivesdk

We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, how 'bout you?
Wednesday Dress Up Day (4/22): Character Day- Dress up as your favorite movie, TV, or book character.
Weekly Challenge: Learn this Dance- "The Weeknd Blinding Lights TikTok Challenge". Many have watched this dance go viral, now we want to see your rendition! Find a helpful tutorial linked below. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BIppvEryH6U
Student Spotlight: Share your hobbies, hidden talents, or let us know what you're doing for fun during this time of social distancing! If you want your school spirit photos shared to the school’s livestream and facebook page, email them to Ms. Christensen at corey.christensen@mckenziesd.org
Go Eagles!
